item.title: Which Unique Identifier is right for you?
item.description: When was the last time you considered unique identifiers (IDs) for your projects?

item.title: Essential Guide to Tech Migration: Why and How to Migrate from AngularJS to Angular
item.description: For countless applications built with AngularJS, a critical decision looms: migrate to Angular or risk stagnation.

item.title: Standup Meeting Playbook
item.description: The “Standup meeting” or “Daily Scrum” that everyone does religiously just for the sake of calling themselves “Agile.

item.title: The Importance of Committing Lock Files in Dependency Management
item.description: In software development, dependency management is a critical aspect that directly impacts the stability and reproducibility of your projects.

item.title: Learnings From Terraform
item.description: Preface Terraform is infrastructure as a code. I know it is a fancy word but here is the meaning.

item.title: Why Code Coverage Should Not Be Your Measure of Reliability
item.description: What is code coverage? Code coverage is a measure (in percentage) of the degree to which the source code of a program is executed wh­en a particular test suite is run.
